always.description: Turn this on if you want the gradient to always be equally spread out. This will disable the gradient map.
always.title: Always Disperse Colors

lowercase.description: Turn this on if you want to use lowercase hex codes.
lowercase.title: Lowercase Hex Codes

trimSpaces.description: Turn this off if you're using empty underlines / strikethroughs
trimSpaces.title: Trim colors from spaces

decoded.description: Successfully decoded the existing RGB text! If this is not what you expected, try changing the threshold value.
decoded.title: RGB Text Decoded!

decode.description: Copy-paste an existing RGB text here to edit it
decode.disclaimer: This feature tries to predict the color points in the gradients and where they are, it is not 100% accurate and we recommend using the presets feature instead to save your gradients.

threshold.description: Try changing this around if you're getting too many colors
threshold.title: Threshold

decode.title: Decode

inputText.description: Type here to generate a gradient!
inputText.title: Input Text

output.copied: The RGB text has been copied to your clipboard successfully.
output.title: Output

imported.description: The preset has been imported successfully.
imported.title: Successfully imported preset!

invalid.description: Please report this to https://discord.gg/9vUZ9MREVz with the preset you tried to import.
invalid.title: Invalid Preset

saved.description: The preset has been saved successfully.
saved.title: Preset Saved!
saved.warning: Please login to save presets permanently.

showSaved.description: Switches between showing all public presets and presets you have saved.
showSaved.title: Show saved presets

url.description: Successfully exported preset to url! (Check the URL bar)
url.title: URL Updated!
